item.title: How to Start a Self-Study Project
item.description: While this post is geared towards self-studying mathematics, I believe that much of this advice can be applied to any subject.

item.title: Mastery-Based Learning
item.description: I have heard from multiple experienced mathematicians that math should be learned bit by bit. Learning mathematics is like stacking blocks on top of each other.

item.title: Multitasking
item.description: Introduction In high school I often times attempted to juggle two tasks. I would have Netflix playing in the background while I work on homework.

item.title: New Projects
item.description: As the title suggests, I am beginning a some projects and recommitting to previous ones that I’ve started as we are just about to start the new month of October.
